channel.title: Server crashes when someone dies
channel.description:
im using a 508 server and everytime someone dies the server crashes and the console says this
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.appendDeath(Player.java:4074) at net.com.codeusa.model.Player.process(Player.java:3449) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:214) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]

item.title: Server crashes when someone dies
